name: First Movement: The Frog and the Knight
desc: Every time an enemy target takes 10 actual Toughness reduction, they become afflicted with 1 stack(s) of "Harmonize."
enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy target takes 10 actual Toughness reduction, they become afflicted with 1 stack(s) of "Harmonize." Actual Toughness reduction received while Weakness Broken will also be taken into account.
